title: Joash Saved and Crowned
summary: After King Ahaziah’s death, his mother Athaliah seizes the throne and kills the royal family, but Joash is secretly rescued and raised in the temple. When Joash is seven, Jehoiada the priest leads a revolt. Joash is crowned king, and Athaliah is executed.

faq.question: How was Joash saved from Athaliah?
faq.answer: He was hidden in the temple by his aunt and raised in secret for six years.

faq.question: What role did Jehoiada play?
faq.answer: He organized Joash’s coronation and led the overthrow of Athaliah.
